entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Portage la Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:50 a.m. CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Portage Southport Airport 10:00 AM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

Visibility: 24 km

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h this afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
